mapper.update: update company_material_in set cg_no=#{cm.cgNo}, cg_name=#{cm.cgName}, task_no=#{cm.taskNo}, sent_date=#{cm.sentDate}, collect_person=#{cm.collectPerson}, demand_project=#{cm.demandProject}, cm_desc=#{cm.cmDesc}, acceptance_opinion=#{cm.acceptanceOpinion}, freight=#{cm.freight} where cm_id=#{cm.cmId}
mapper.select: select cg_no,cg_name,task_no,demand_project from company_material_in a left join mode_status m on m.mode_id=a.cm_id where m.status=2
mapper.update: update company_material_in set out_state=#{outstate} where cm_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from company_material_in where task_no like #{no} and out_state=#{outstate}
select DISTINCT task_no,demand_project,cg_no,cg_name,cm_id from company_material_in where get_status=1
select * from company_material_in where task_no like #{no} and out_state=1 and get_status=1 and remain_type=#{type}
